name: Tabs: Hide Title & Favicon on Blank Tab
description: Removes the "(Untitled)" text and "blank page" favicon on blank tabs.
additional_info:
If you use a non-English version of Firefox, you must replace "(Untitled)"/"New Tab" (without " ") in the code with whatever reads in your blank tab (Sans titre, Nova aba, etc).

(11/08/2010) Compatibility with Firefox 4.
(02/08/2009) user 26473: I don't have access to a Mac to really test it, but I changed the code a little so it should work now; please let me know.
(18/04/2009) user 14809: added compatibility with style 11200.
(14/03/2009) Improved identity button favicon selector.
(07/01/2009) Improved the tab selector.
